mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REVIEW_FILE (UUID, UPLOAD_PATH, NAME, IMAGE, REVIEW_NUMBER) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{image}, #{reviewNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT UUID, UPLOAD_PATH, NAME, IMAGE, REVIEW_NUMBER FROM TBL_REVIEW_FILE WHERE UPLOAD_PATH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
